item.title: 4 dead in a San Antonio crash involving a bus and a stolen vehicle, police say
item.description: Police say four people have died and over a dozen are injured after a speeding stolen car struck a trailer attached to a bus in San Antonio

item.title: Man accused of stockpiling bombs, using Biden photo for target practice, pleads guilty
item.description: A Virginia man has pleaded guilty in a federal case that accused him of stockpiling the largest number of finished explosives in FBI history

item.title: Nagasaki cathedral blesses a bell that replaces one destroyed by the US atomic bomb
item.description: Nagasaki cathedral has blessed the final piece to complete its restoration nearly 80 years after being destroyed by the second U.S. atomic bomb droppe...
